name: Let Us Fly
description:
This is for Tutorial Game Jam  Help the ball to get into the hole in order to save them. You have 60 seconds to save as much as possible. So what is your choice? To save them or to kill them?

Hold left click mouse on the ball to drag.

Aim the ball while holding it.

Release the left click mouse to launch the ball.

*This game is still in prototype stage to test the idea. Do support me if you like the game.

Sound FX by https://www.zapsplat.com
